analyzed: smṛti adhyāyaḥ
prathamam āhnikam

original: nyā. pa. śa. 49 atha smṛtirnirūpyate--- saṃskāramātrajaṃ jñānaṃ smṛtiḥ,
analyzed: atha smṛtiḥ nirūpyate saṃskāra mātra jam jñānam smṛtiḥ
iti tad lakṣaṇam
nanu smṛtiḥ na pramāṇam
a vidyamāna viṣaya tvāt
an anubhūti tvāt
bhrama sambhava uccā iti ced na
smṛti mātra aprāmāṇyasya prathama āhnikre pratikṣipta tvāt
avādhita bāhya artha darśanāt
atīta anāgata viṣaya anumāna ādi bādha prasaṅgāt
sarva loka virodhāt
ananubhūte artha antare pi smṛti prasaṅgāt
smṛteḥ api sva prakāśa tve pi vedya ākāre saṃskāra ādi sāpekṣa tvāt
na ca pūrva anubhava puraskāreṇa eva grahaṇāt aprāmāṇyam iti ced na
smṛti pramoṣe tad abhāvāt
pramāṇa tayā saṃmatāyām pratyabhijñāyām bhāvāt ca
paratantra tvāt apramāṇyam iti ced na
sva hetu pāratantrya mātrasya sārvatrika tvāt
anubhava mūla tvasya pramāṇa mūla tvasya ca savikalpaka ādibhiḥ anaikāntika tvāt
saṃskāra mātra janya tvasya asādhāraṇa tvāt
sva viṣaya prakāśa vyavahārayoḥ tu smṛteḥ api svatantra tvāt
icchā ādi vat viṣaya niyame pi pāratantryam asti iti ced na
tadvat eva ajñāna tva prasaṅgāt
jñānam eva hi svatas viṣaya pravaṇam icchasi

original: ata eva hi nityayorapi riśvaracikīrṣāprayatnayorviṣaya niyamāya jñānāpekṣāṃ brūṣe /
analyzed: atas eva hi nityayoḥ api riśvara cikīrṣā prayatnayoḥ viṣaya niyamāya jñāna apekṣām brūṣe

original: icchādīnāmapi svato viṣayaprāvaṇyaṃ jñānatvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ svīkṛtam /
analyzed: icchā ādīnām api svatas viṣaya prāvaṇyam jñāna tvam ca asmābhiḥ svīkṛtam
nanu saṃskāra vat iti ced na
tasya api sva hetu samāna viṣaya jñāna utpādana śakta svabhāva tvāt
atas hetu niyata viṣaya tvam eva phalitam
tat ca anubhave pi samam

original: tathā ca samānaviṣayānubhavajanyatvatadabhāvābhyāṃ smṛtyanubhavayoḥ pāratantryasvātantryavyavahāro mandānām /
analyzed: tathā ca samāna viṣaya anubhava janya tva tad abhāvābhyām smṛti anubhavayoḥ pāratantrya svātantrya vyavahāraḥ mandānām
sva prāmāṇya nirṇaya ādau api nā anubhava apekṣa tva nirbandhaḥ
sva viṣaya prakāśana bādha viraha ādibhiḥ a tad siddheḥ
gṛhīta mātra grāhi tvasya asādhāraṇa tvāt

original: prābhākarāṇāmanumānādau naiyāyikādīnāṃ dhārāvāhikādau yogasiddhasarvajñavādināṃ dvitīyayogapratyakṣādau keṣāñcidīśvaravādināmanityeśvarajñāne  #
analyzed: prābhākarāṇām anumāna ādau naiyāyika ādīnām dhārāvāhika ādau yoga siddha sarvajña vādinām dvitīya yoga pratyakṣa ādau keṣāñcid īśvara vādinām anitya īśvara jñāne
ca vyabhicārāt ca
niṣprayojana tvāt aprāmāṇyam iti ced na
tṛṇa ādi viṣaya pratna yakṣa ādi nānā aikāntyāt
asiddheḥ ca
smṛtyā eva hi jagatām kṛta akṛta pratyavekṣaṇa ādi siddhiḥ
smṛtyā eva hi śabda anumānayoḥ pravṛtiḥ
para bhakti ādi niṣpattiḥ ca
pūrva anubhuvasya eva tāni prayojanāni iti ced
sarva jagat ādi kāraṇasya brahma saṃkalpasya eva kim na syuḥ
evam ca anubhavasya api na tad siddhiḥ
tad kāraṇasya iti vaktum śakya tvāt
yat uktam prajñā paritrāṇe jñātātma jñāna rūpa tvāt sva prameya prahāṇataḥ
viṣaya avyabhicāri tve ipi aprāmāṇyam smṛteḥ matam
ityādi tat api anena parihṛtam
pramāṇa vyavahāra abhāvāt aprāmāṇyam iti ced na
evam parīkṣaka vyavahāra bhāvasya api
vigīta tvāt ca
sarva parīkṣaka vyavahāra abhāvasya ca asiddheḥ
mānamanohara ādau vāgīśvara ādibhiḥ tad prāmāṇyasya ukta tvāt
katipaya parīkṣaka vyahāra abhāvasya ca atiprasañjaka tvāt
akṣapāda ādi vyahāra avyavahārayoḥ bṛhaspati ādi vyavahāra vat asmābhiḥ na atīva ādaraṇāt
indrapāṇinī ādīnām tu sarva saṃpratipatteḥ abādhāt ca ādarāt
pārāśarya ādīnām pramāṇa parigaṇana anadhikṛta tvena tad anukteḥ aprayojaka tvāt
āgamaḥ pramāṇam iti api vyavahāra abhāvāt
pratyakṣam ca anumānam ca śāstram ca vividha āgamam
ityādiṣu ca pratyakṣa ādi mūla smṛteḥ pratyakṣa ādi samāna carca tvena pṛthak vyavahāra abhāva upapatteḥ
pramāṇa hetukā smṛtiḥ pramāṇam eva
avisaṃvādāt iti

original: uktaṃ ca nyāyatattve smṛtyudāsīnabhedake caturthedhikaraṇe--- “apramāṇamūlatvaṃ tu ubhayorapi nāsti,
analyzed: uktam ca nyāyatattve smṛti udāsīna bhedake caturthe adhikaraṇe apramāṇa mūla tvam tu ubhayoḥ api nā asti
vyabhicāra abhāvena anadhigata artham pramāṇam iti viśeṣaṇasya ayukta tvāt
pramite pramiti anupapattiḥ kva dṛṣṭā
smṛtau ced pratijñā eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt
jñāna antare ced na nujānāmi ityādi
tattvaratnākare ca yathā artha niścayaḥ mānam tad hetuḥ ca iti sūrayaḥ

original: nātivyāptiḥ smṛtau vyāptiryathārthena hi sā pramā” //
analyzed: na ativyāptiḥ smṛtau vyāptiḥ yathā arthena hi sā pramā
iti uktvā asya uttara ardha vivaraṇe api uktam anubhūta viṣaya asaṃpramoṣaḥ smṛtiḥ
yathā āsa ghaṭa ati
nanu tām api vyāpnoti
satyam
tad vyāptau na ativyāptiḥ
tasya api lakṣya pakṣe nikṣepāt
lakṣya alakṣye an ālakṣya kṣipyate lakṣaṇam katham
loka dhī vyavahāram hi lakṣya a lakṣya avadhi viduḥ
ityādi
yat tu anubhavaḥ pramāṇam
smṛti vyatiriktam jñānam anubhavaḥ ityādinā smṛteḥ aprāmāṇyam uktam iva śrī viṣṇu cittaiḥ
tat nūnam paramatā anvāroheṇa

original: ata eva hi taiḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyanirṇayadaśāyāmanyathā vyavahṛtam /
analyzed: atas eva hi taiḥ svatas prāmāṇya nirṇaya daśāyām anyathā vyavahṛtam

original: tathāhi--- “tasmāt siddhametat pramāṇānāṃ yathārthatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ guṇajñānānapekṣāt svapramāṇādevāvasīyate,
analyzed: tathā hi tasmāt siddham etat pramāṇānām yathārtha tva lakṣaṇam prāmāṇyam guṇa jñāna anapekṣāt sva pramāṇāt eva avasīyate

original: svakīyāt kāraṇādeva jñāyata iti ca” iti /
analyzed: svakīyāt kāraṇāt eva jñāyate iti ca iti
tathā artha tathātvam guṇa saṃvāda jñāna anapekṣa jñapti
tad abhāve api jñāyamāna tvāt ityādau
na ca hetoḥ asiddha tvam
tathā hi rajata jñānasya artha tathātvam nāma rajata viṣaya tvam
tat ca asati bādhake rajata grāhiṇā eva jñānena avagamyate ityādi
atas yathā avasthita vastu niścaya ātmaka tvam eva prāmāṇyam pramāṇa jñānānām ātmīyāt kāraṇāt jñāyate
na guṇa saṃvāda jñānam apekṣate iti
tathā pramāṇānām yathā avasthita vastu niścaya ātmaka tvam eva prāmāṇyam
tad ābhāsa yuktayaḥ pūrvapakṣiṇā ucyante
siddhānte pi viveka pradarśanam eva iti
yadi ca anubhavaḥ eva pramāṇam
tat na yuktam upayuktam vā
na ca sarvam anubhavam pramāṇa tayā vyavaharanti
pīta śaṅkha bhrama ādiṣu adarśanāt
nā api sarvām smṛtim apramāṇa tayā
pramāṇa mūla smṛtiṣu tad abhāvāt
agṛhīta grahaṇa śaktam pramāṇam iti varada viṣṇumiśra uktiḥ api paramata anvāroheṇa netavyā
yat tu āgama prāmāṇye proktam pramāṇa antara dṛṣṭa artha viṣaya vyāpi śemuṣī

original: pramāṇameva tatpūrvaṃ na cet svārthaṃ vigāhate” //
analyzed: pramāṇam eva tat pūrvam na ced sva artham vigāhate
iti idam api anuvāda vākyasya anya para tayā svārtha prāmāṇya vyavaccheda artham

original: anyathā smṛtipramoṣe pramuṣitatadaṃśe pūrvānubhavapuraskāreṇa svārthāvagāhanāsiddheḥ kathaṃ tatra smṛtitvanibandhanamaprāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: anyathā smṛti pramoṣe pramuṣita tad aṃśe pūrva anubhava puraskāreṇa sva artha avagāhana asiddheḥ katham tatra smṛti tva nibandhanam aprāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati
nyā pa śa  yat tu bhāṣye sat mātra grāhi pratyakṣa nirākaraṇa daśāyām uktam aśve

original: hastini ca saṃvedanayorekaviṣayatvenoparitanasya gṛhītagrāhitvād viśeṣābhāvācca smṛtivailakṣaṇyaṃ na syāt” iti,
analyzed: hastini ca saṃvedanayoḥ eka viṣaya tvena uparitanasya gṛhīta grāhi tvāt viśeṣa abhāvāt ca smṛti vailakṣaṇyam na syāt iti
na tatra smṛteḥ aprāmāṇyam sūcitam
prakāra antareṇa api vailakṣaṇya siddheḥ
tad apekṣayā ca prasaṅga upapatteḥ
yat ca aparam bhāṣyam indriya janmanaḥ pratyakṣasya hi eṣa svabhāva niyamaḥ
yat sva sama kāla vartinaḥ padārthasya grāhaka tvam

original: na tu sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ ca,
analyzed: na tu sarveṣām jñānānām pramāṇānām ca
smaraṇa anumāna āgama yogi pratyakṣa ādiṣu kāla antara vartinaḥ api grahaṇa darśanāt ityādi
tatra api parasya aniṣṭa prasaṅgāya tad abhiprāya anudhāvanena vibhajya udāharaṇam yuktam

original: yacca śāstrayonyadhikaraṇe bhāṣitam--- “bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanastasya viśadāvabhāsatvepi pūrvānubhūtaviṣayasmṛtimātratvānna prāmāṇyamiti  #
analyzed: yat ca śāstrayoni adhikaraṇe bhāṣitam bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta janmanaḥ tasya viśada avabhāsa tve pi pūrva anubhūta viṣaya smṛti mātra tvāt na prāmāṇyam iti
kutas pratyakṣa tā
iti idam api na sākṣāt siddhānta stham
na ca yāthārthyam tatra pratikṣiptam
evam anyat api bhāvyam
smṛti aprāmāṇya vādinaḥ api vaiśeṣikāḥ tām yathārthyāt vidyākoṭau paṭhanti

original: tata eva ca tadekadeśibhirapi tatprāmāṇyaṃ svīkṛtam, iti //
analyzed: tatas eva ca tad eka deśibhiḥ api tad prāmāṇyam svīkṛtam iti

original: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāyapariśuddhau smṛtyadhyāye prathamamāhnikam
analyzed: iti śrī kavi tārkikasiṃhasya sarva tantra svatantrasya śrīmat veṅkaṭanāthasya vedānta ācāryasya kṛtiṣu nyāya pariśuddhau smṛti adhyāye prathamam āhnikam
